trans-unit.source: What's new in ATA version 1.5 | Microsoft ATA
trans-unit.target: What's new in ATA version 1.5 | Microsoft ATA

trans-unit.source: Lists what was new in ATA version 1.5 along with known issues
trans-unit.target: Lists what was new in ATA version 1.5 along with known issues

trans-unit.source: What's new in ATA version 1.5
trans-unit.target: What's new in ATA version 1.5

trans-unit.source: These release notes provide information about known issues in this version of Advanced Threat Analytics.
trans-unit.target: These release notes provide information about known issues in this version of Advanced Threat Analytics.

trans-unit.source: What's new in the ATA 1.5 update?
trans-unit.target: What's new in the ATA 1.5 update?

trans-unit.source: The update to ATA 1.5 provides improvements in the following areas:
trans-unit.target: The update to ATA 1.5 provides improvements in the following areas:

trans-unit.source: Faster detection times
trans-unit.target: Faster detection times

trans-unit.source: Enhanced automatic detection algorithm for NAT (network address translation) devices
trans-unit.target: Enhanced automatic detection algorithm for NAT (network address translation) devices

trans-unit.source: Enhanced name resolution process for non-domain joined devices
trans-unit.target: Enhanced name resolution process for non-domain joined devices

trans-unit.source: Support for data migration during product updates
trans-unit.target: Support for data migration during product updates

trans-unit.source: Better UI responsiveness for suspicious activities with thousands of entities involved
trans-unit.target: Better UI responsiveness for suspicious activities with thousands of entities involved

trans-unit.source: Improved auto-resolution of monitoring alerts
trans-unit.target: Improved auto-resolution of monitoring alerts

trans-unit.source: Additional performance counters for enhanced monitoring and troubleshooting
trans-unit.target: Additional performance counters for enhanced monitoring and troubleshooting

trans-unit.source: Known issues
trans-unit.target: Known issues

trans-unit.source: The following known issues exist in this version.
trans-unit.target: The following known issues exist in this version.

trans-unit.source: New ATA Gateway installation fails
trans-unit.target: New ATA Gateway installation fails

trans-unit.source: After updating your ATA deployment to ATA version 1.5, you get the following error when installing a new ATA Gateway: Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics Gateway is not installed
trans-unit.target: After updating your ATA deployment to ATA version 1.5, you get the following error when installing a new ATA Gateway: Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics Gateway is not installed

trans-unit.source: ATA GW error
trans-unit.target: ATA GW error

trans-unit.source: Workaround: Send an email to to request workaround steps.
trans-unit.target: Workaround: Send an email to to request workaround steps.

trans-unit.source: Deployment
trans-unit.target: Deployment

trans-unit.source: The folder specified for the "Database data path" and "Database journal path" has to be empty (no files or subfolders).
trans-unit.target: The folder specified for the "Database data path" and "Database journal path" has to be empty (no files or subfolders).

trans-unit.source: If it is not empty, the deployment will not progress.
trans-unit.target: If it is not empty, the deployment will not progress.

trans-unit.source: Installation from Zip file
trans-unit.target: Installation from Zip file

trans-unit.source: When installing the ATA Gateway, make sure to extract the files from the zip file to a local directory and install it from there.
trans-unit.target: When installing the ATA Gateway, make sure to extract the files from the zip file to a local directory and install it from there.

trans-unit.source: Do not install the ATA Gateway directly from within the zip file or the installation will fail.
trans-unit.target: Do not install the ATA Gateway directly from within the zip file or the installation will fail.

trans-unit.source: Configuration
trans-unit.target: Configuration

trans-unit.source: After the configuration for an ATA Gateway is set, when the ATA Gateway starts for the first time, the "Not Synced" label is displayed until the service is fully started which may take up to 10 minutes the first time the service starts.
trans-unit.target: After the configuration for an ATA Gateway is set, when the ATA Gateway starts for the first time, the "Not Synced" label is displayed until the service is fully started which may take up to 10 minutes the first time the service starts.

trans-unit.source: Network Capture Software
trans-unit.target: Network Capture Software

trans-unit.source: On the ATA Gateway, the only supported network capture software you can install is [Microsoft Network Monitor 3.4](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=4865).
trans-unit.target: On the ATA Gateway, the only supported network capture software you can install is [Microsoft Network Monitor 3.4](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=4865).

trans-unit.source: Do not install Microsoft Message Analyzer or any other network capturing software.
trans-unit.target: Do not install Microsoft Message Analyzer or any other network capturing software.

trans-unit.source: Installing other software will cause the ATA Gateway to stop functioning properly.
trans-unit.target: Installing other software will cause the ATA Gateway to stop functioning properly.

trans-unit.source: KB on virtualization host
trans-unit.target: KB on virtualization host

trans-unit.source: Do not install KB 3047154 on a virtualization host.
trans-unit.target: Do not install KB 3047154 on a virtualization host.

trans-unit.source: This may cause port mirroring to stop working properly.
trans-unit.target: This may cause port mirroring to stop working properly.

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: See Also

trans-unit.target: [Update ATA to version 1.5 - migration guide](ata-update-1.5-migration-guide.md)
